Description: Fragment of foot of large Chian pottery chalice; interior reserved; exterior glazed with added white decoration: long rayes above chevron frieze beteen bands (2 above, 3 below).
Curator's comments: Marked 'Naukratis 1st Season' in pencil. An unusually elaborate piece, well preserved.
Bibliographic references: Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GD2233)
